newsitem.title: UK: Laid up tankers up nearly half mln tonnes in October.
newsitem.headline: Laid up tankers up nearly half mln tonnes in October.

text.p: Laid up/idle tanker tonnage as at October 31, 1996 totalled just over two million dwt comprising 21 tankers and three combined carriers, trade sources said.
The total number of vessels was up two with two combined carriers added. A 15,907 dwt tanker was taken off for demolition and a 126,080 dwt tanker was added to the list.
Total tonnage was up by 437,185 dwt at 2,019,166 tonnes.
They said the following categories of vessels were not included in the assessment.
- Vessles engaged in floating storage duties.
- Vessels withouth employment but available for prompt
- Combined carriers which do not retain oil clasification.
